text:
This list of #UnitySchools closed by this thing in #Nigeria shd concentrate minds. It includes FGC Ilorin; FGGC Bakori; FGC Rubochi; FGGC Abaji; & Ushi-Ekiti. 

This covers 4 out of 6 geo-political zones in #Nigeria & the FCT. This is beyond serious....!

text:
The system of admissions into professional courses like Medicine & Nursing in #Nigeria's universities has bn bastardized.

VCs & their cronies & families are admitting unfit students who pay extortionate amounts. Provosts don't know what happens. We're licensing killers as Drs.
fullText:
The system of admissions into professional courses like Medicine & Nursing in #Nigeria's universities has bn bastardized.

VCs & their cronies & families are admitting unfit students who pay extortionate amounts. Provosts don't know what happens. We're licensing killers as Drs.

author.name: Chidi Odinkalu, CGoF

quote.text:
Chinemerem Celina Nlebechi scored 322 in JAMB and 323.8 in Post UTME but was denied admission to study medicine in UNN.

I have evidence of 3 students that scored 235, 265 and 285 respectively that got admitted into medicine UNN.

My intel alleged that they paid N2 million. https://t.co/zdIbDoRSZ4
